                 int amount,
                 net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entity)
        Adds an amount of steam to the item.

      • hasPower

                 int powerNeeded)
        Checks whether the ItemStack has the amount of power in its steam storage. The opposite of
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack
        powerNeeded - The amount of power needed
        Returns:
        True if it has power, false if it doesn't.

      • needsPower

        boolean needsPower(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                   int powerNeeded)
        Checks whether the ItemStack can have the amount of power added to its steam storage.
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack
        powerNeeded - The amount of power to add
        Returns:
        True if it will not exceed the limit with this amount of power added to it, false if it will, or if it is not a chestplate.

      • drainSteam

        boolean drainSteam(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                   int amountToDrain,
                   net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entity)
        Drains the provided amount of steam from the armor.
        Parameters:
        me - The armor piece to drain from.
        amountToDrain - The amount of steam to drain from the armor.
        entity - The entity using the thing.
        Returns:
        Whether steam was successfully drained.
